name: Nadia Pearce
summary: Detail-oriented REST API developer with seven years of experience. Can thoroughly examine API designs, offer impressive feedback, and clearly communicate with companies throughout the development process. Looking to help Grayson Mobile develop a powerful system for their website as a REST API developer.
skills: Ability to work with JavaScript, HTML and JSON
Programming language proficiency in Java, C++ and SQL
Experience with Windows XP, Windows 10 and Unix
Strong communication expertise and interpersonal skills
Powerful skills in API development, specifically for web use

workExperience.title: REST API developer
responsibilities: Worked with the company remotely to develop API systems for their website.
Consistently communicated with the company's project manager to ensure the API system was meeting expectations.
Developed an impressive system that helped the company meet its goals and ensure major success.

workExperience.title: REST API consultant
responsibilities: Worked directly with a company and its API developer to create REST API designs.
Used my expertise to offer them feedback and help ensure their end product was successful.
Increased the overall efficiency of the project by 25%.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in computer science
